Hello network. I've got a friend who has the capital and needs to scale from 50 to 100 corporate-owned service-based locations next year. Needs to build process and systems around all the things (Operations, Recruitment, Training, Marketing, HR, Account, site launches, etc, etc). Anyone specialize in one or more of these areas? Or do you know someone who might? If so, please connect!

I advise or develop both strategic and tactical growth initiatives in companies that do interesting things. I'm am an expert operator across Marketing & Sales Systems, Customer Experience, Capitalization, User Experience Design, and overall Product Strategy.
I believe in this new age of screens and "smart" fill-in-the-blank, every home with kids under 18 should have Clean Router technology. It's not even an option anymore.
I advise on overall strategy, capital raising, revenue acquisition, messaging and positioning.

ClickIPO brings crowdfunding technology and investor appetite to the $180B IPO market. As Cofounder at ClickIPO Holdings, I oversaw strategy, capital raising, product direction & design, marketing (user acquisition), recruiting, and brand.
Partner and Vice President, Business Development

I helped build Tallwave to the premiere innovation agency in the Southwest. Specializing in new, innovative technology products, UI/UX, development, branding and growth systems for startups around the country and, innovation strategy for large enterprise. We also built a separate capital fund called Tallwave Capital that focuses on Seed stage B2B SaaS companies.

I founded the Startup & Entrepreneurship Committee at the AZ Tech Council, within which we launched the Corporate Connect program (connecting C-level execs at the largest companies in town with start-ups), and the Startup Connect conference, Arizona's largest conference and pitch event for early stage tech ventures.

summary: I've been an operator in three venture-backed startups, all exited, and most recently founder of ClickIPO where I raised $3.4M, built a team and launched into market one of the most admired start-ups in the FinTech space. Before that, I worked with over 100 tech startups across the country as senior partner in the venture studio, Tallwave. I've also helped a number of large enterprises on their technology and innovation strategies.  I also helped build the first Seed-stage tech fund that Arizona has seen in over a decade. Currently, I advise a handful of startups while teaching professional marketers, entrepreneurs and product teams some of the secrets of successfully commercializing early stage tech products.------------------------Finance, Fundraising, Capitalization, Digital Marketing, SEO, SEM, PPC, Email Nurturing, Social Media, Lean Business, Design Thinking, Software Development, Mobile App Development, Product Management, Positioning, Go-to-Market, Strategic Marketing, Sales, Telemarketing, CRM, Prospecting, Marketing Automation, Field Sales, Corporate Development, Venture-backed, Enterprise Sales, Venture Capital firm, Early-stage, Cloud-based, New Market Development, Security Software, Distribution Deals, User Experience, UI/UX, Design, Rapid Prototyping, Front-end Development, Back-end DevelopmentMisspellings: Jared Bailey, Jarred Bailey, Jarrod Bailey
